item.title: HttpClient
Interceptors
item.description: Interceptors are used in Angular to intercept and handle an HttpRequest and HttpResponse. To add some specific headers or params in our request or say modify my HttpRequest or HttpResponse, rather than handling it separately for each of my requests angular generally provides us interceptors. They are written once and intercepted by all our requests and response using the HttpClient. By intercepting the HTTP request, we can modify or change the value of the request.
